STATUS = #{status} AND ord.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT distinct od.order_id AS orderId, de.title AS title, de.quantity AS quantity, de.own_spec AS ownSpec, de.image_url AS imageUrl FROM tb_order od LEFT JOIN tb_order_detail de ON od.order_id = de.order_id where od.user_id = #{userId} AND od.order_id in (select order_id from tb_after_sales)
